title: I heard that the Cozi TV network was coming back to a TV station in Odgen NC since it was dropped by WWAY.  What is that station's channel number and will it be on cable?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/05/is-it-true-that-wtmv-29-in-odgen-is-bringing-back-the-cozi-tv-network-that-wway-dropped/
